page.description: Is the dialog active (focus on dialog or parent).

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
.T. = The dialog, or an embedded dialog within the dialog, or any control on the dialog has focus.
.F. = No component of the dialog has focus.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog when created with UI_DLG_BOX() or UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX().

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_IS_ACTIVE() function returns .T. (True) if the dialog, or an embedded dialog within the dialog, or any control on the dialog has focus.
